values.desc: If javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactory#getFeature returns true when passed this value as an argument, the Transformer supports Source input of this type.

values.ctor:
<init>(n: Node!)
            Create a new input source with a DOM node.

<init>(node: Node!, systemID: String!)
            Create a new input source with a DOM node, and with the system ID also passed in as the base URI.

values.desc: Get the node that represents a Source DOM tree.
Get the base ID (URL or system ID) from where URLs will be resolved.
Set the node that will represents a Source DOM tree.
Set the base ID (URL or system ID) from where URLs will be resolved.
